translation.en: [man] If you're from the outside of the show world looking in,
everything that you see
makes you think that those people are crazy.
You know, the mannerisms, the quirks,
if you don't know anything about it, it looks ludicrous.
translation.ko: 아무것도 모르는 사람 눈에는 우스꽝스러워 보일 테죠

translation.en: Once you get in it,
you realize that in the course of any given show weekend,
translation.ko: 어느 때고 주말 내내 쇼에 있다는 걸 깨닫죠

translation.en: you will become those people at some point.
translation.ko: 어느 순간부터 그 사람들처럼 될 거예요

translation.en: Every dog that's out there and handler
have been working for their lives, basically,
towards that moment.
[man] At this level of competition,
there's a lot of brutality,
there's a lot of talking behind the scenes.
For a guy like me to be at Westminster,
translation.ko: 저 같은 사람에게 웨스트민스터에 오는 건

translation.en: it blows my mind.
[reporter] Just how important is the Westminster Kennel Club Dog Show?
translation.ko: 웨스트민스터 켄넬 클럽 도그 쇼가 얼마나 대단한 겁니까?

translation.en: Kentucky Derby, Wimbledon, Muhammad Ali,
it's the Super Bowl, it's the World Series, it's all of it.
This is as high as you go and as far as you go. This is the top.
translation.ko: 정상을 향해 가장 높이 가장 멀리 온 곳입니다

translation.en: [reporter] And you can imagine the hearts that are beating right now.
[announcer 1] Samantha, the English springer spaniel. [announcer 2] Oh, the pointer.
A NETFLIX ORIGINAL SERIES
[man] Come here, girl. You want to go to the show?
You want to go to the show?
You want to go for a road trip?
You do?
We've only been competing for two and a half years,
translation.ko: 저희가 대회에 나선 지 2년 반밖에 안 됐으니까

translation.en: so this is our first chance at Westminster.
When we first start started, we researched breeds...
translation.ko: 저희가 처음 시작할 때 견종을 조사하고... "마이크 고언 견주 / 핸들러"

translation.en: and settled on the harrier.
It's a very rare breed.
We managed to convince a breeder
to sell us one out of her litter.
translation.ko: 한 배에서 나온 새끼 중 한 마리를 샀습니다

translation.en: [woman] She flew in three weeks later from Oregon to Miami.
translation.ko: 3주 후에 오리건에서 마이애미로 비행기를 타고 왔죠

translation.en: Here she is!
Oh, my God!
-Look at that face. -[Mike] Oh, she's so adorable.
translation.ko: - 쟤 얼굴 좀 봐 - 정말 귀엽네

translation.en: [woman] Oh, my God.
-They opened the gates and I was just-- -Here comes this crate being pushed down.
translation.ko: - 문이 열리는데 전 그냥... - 에미가 든 상자가 밀려 내려오는데 그건 정말...

translation.en: Yeah, that was incredible.
translation.ko: 밀려 내려오는데 그건 정말... 믿어지지 않았죠

translation.en: Uh-oh. There it is, the start.
The breeder said, "Consider showing."
We're like, "What? Show?"
We went to a show two weeks later.
You know, we're like, "Wow, look at all this."
You know, I've never seen so many dogs in one place in my life.
translation.ko: 한자리에 그렇게 개가 많은 건 제 평생 처음 봤어요

translation.en: It was overwhelming.
So we're sitting there and people starting coming up and going,
translation.ko: 자리에 앉았는데 사람들이 오고 가기 시작하더니

translation.en: "This is the most spectacular harrier we've seen in years,
translation.ko: '우리가 몇 년간 봤던 중에 가장 눈부신 해리어네요'

translation.en: look at the top line, look at the tail carriage."
translation.ko: '저 탑 라인을 봐요 저 테일 캐리지를 봐요'

translation.en: "What? What are you talking about?"
We were like, "Huh?"
We had a great time that weekend.
Yeah, we had fun as a family
translation.ko: 네, 저희는 한 가족으로서 즐겁게 보냈죠

translation.en: and decided to go to another show.
translation.ko: 그리고... 또 다른 쇼에 가보기로 했어요

translation.en: [Phyllis] Emmy, this is happening!
Oh, my God! Oh, my God!
[Mike] We're so new in this sport, that every ribbon, every rosette
translation.ko: 저희는 도그 스포츠가 처음이라서 모든 리본, 모든 로제트가

translation.en: is really special to us.
That's the result of getting out there,
almost every weekend.
Good girl.
You know, we have our dreams, but the dreams aren't focused on money.
translation.ko: 저희에겐 꿈이 있지만 돈을 많이 투자하진 않아요

translation.en: Hey, calm down.
We don't have $10,000 budgets
every month, like a lot of the--
the top dogs and the top handlers have.
Come here, girl.
We...
are on a shoestring.
My suit for Westminster, we found at a thrift shop...
translation.ko: 웨스트민스터에서 입을 제 정장은 중고 의류 가게에서

translation.en: for $5.
I'm not a 30-year-old who goes jogging in the morning
translation.ko: 저는 30살이 아니라 아침마다 조깅을 할 수도

translation.en: to stay in shape, to be able to run around a ring with a dog.
translation.ko: 몸매를 유지할 수도 개와 함께 링을 돌 수도 없어요

translation.en: But I'm able to be competitive.
Up. Come on, up. Good.
Winning at Westminster, it is a life-changing thing.
translation.ko: 웨스트민스터에서 우승하는 건 인생이 바뀔 만한 일이죠

translation.en: If the stars align [laughs]
and it becomes like a dream or a Cinderella story,
then we will be competing in best in show at Westminster
translation.ko: 웨스트민스터에서 쇼 최고상을 다투게 될 겁니다

translation.en: on Tuesday night.
We don't even have a hotel reserved for Tuesday night,
translation.ko: 화요일 밤 호텔 예약도 안 해뒀지만요

translation.en: so we'll probably be sleeping in the street somewhere if that happens.
translation.ko: 그러니 그렇게 되면 길바닥에서 자야 할 거예요

translation.en: The $5 suit.
All right.
The head in a boxer is so important,
and in this dog, it's so beautiful.
All this in this dog, the neck,
the way the necks go into the shoulders
is so beautiful.
So, I always try to keep him up.
translation.ko: 그래서 항상 자세를 바르게 하려고 하죠

translation.en: That way, we can show that, on him.
I met him at a dog show.
Let's say the truth,
-you saw me and you fell in love. -I actually really didn't like him at all.
translation.ko: - 사랑에 빠졌다고 - 사실 전혀 안 좋아했어요

translation.en: -Through, in a way-- -You fell in love, say the truth.
translation.ko: - 어쩌다 보니 - 사랑에 빠졌잖아, 사실대로 말해

translation.en: I don't know, through the years, I maybe built a wall.
translation.ko: 글쎄요, 제가 몇 년간 벽을 쌓았을지도 몰라요

translation.en: It's just that I'm so concentrated what I'm doing,
translation.ko: 제가 하는 일에 몹시 집중할 뿐이죠

translation.en: that I forget to smile. [laughs]
I've been showing boxers and dobermans all my life
translation.ko: 저는 평생 복서와 도베르만을 쇼에서 선보였어요

translation.en: in different countries,
different places.
I came to the US, because the US is the best place to do what we do.
translation.ko: 미국에 왔죠, 왜냐하면 제 일을 하기엔 미국이 최고거든요

translation.en: When you come from another country,
I think you have so much you want to prove
that you're just as good as people here,
and, you know, you have to work ten times harder
and you want to prove yourself.
[Allison] As professional handlers,
we have a lot of dogs living with us.
There are nice things about each one of 'em,
but it's not often that you have a dog this special.
translation.ko: 하나하나마다 장점이 있지만 이렇게 특별한 개를 갖는 건 흔치 않은 일이죠

translation.en: This is Thor, our pet.
Sophia's guard.
Beside a show dog, he's our friend, he's everything for us.
You build a relationship every day.
They get to love you, and you get to love them.
I will miss him. I will miss showing him.
translation.ko: 토르가 그리울 거예요 토르를 선보이는 게 그리울 거예요

translation.en: [Allison] Tomorrow, we're gonna leave for Westminster.
You go to New York, the big city,
you go to the Madison Square Garden.
The first time I got there, I was like, "Whoa.
Whoa."
When you see the Empire State with the lights,
with the color of Westminster, I couldn't believe.
translation.ko: 조명이 들어온 걸 보면 믿을 수 없었어요

translation.en: And now let's give a round of applause for the 15th annual New York Pet Fashion Show.
translation.ko: 제15회 뉴욕 펫 패션쇼를 박수로 맞아주십시오 "호텔에 있는 많은 개가 관련된 행사는 펫 패션쇼다"

translation.en: Her name is Gia,
and she has her own couture line, which is called Gia Diamond Couture.
translation.ko: 지아의 쿠튀르 라인이 있어요 지아 다이아몬드 쿠튀르라고 해요

translation.en: This is Baxter,
and he's a Rhinestone cowboy today,
so he's blinged out to the max.
This is Portia, and this is Rosie.
And these outfits were fashioned after
translation.ko: 그리고 이 의상들은 돌체 앤 가바나의

translation.en: the Dolce and Gabbana Blue Jean Wedding Collection.
This is the 142nd year of Westminster.
All the 50 states are represented at the show.
You know, more than ten countries are here.
[Sean] We inherit a 250,000-square-foot facility that's completely empty,
translation.ko: 우리 클럽이 물려받는 7,000평의 시설은 완전히 비어 있습니다

translation.en: it's just concrete floor and nothing else.
You know, you just wouldn't believe
how many details there are in putting the show on.
translation.ko: 쇼에 설치되는 세부적인 게 얼마나 많은지요

translation.en: [woman] All right.
It looks like it's already set up down there, so that's ready to go.
translation.ko: 밑에는 이미 설치된 것 같네요 그러니까, 준비된 거죠

translation.en: Oh, this will be packed, packed with people to see dogs,
translation.ko: 여기가 꽉 들어찰 거예요 개들을 보려는 사람들로요

translation.en: and it's gonna be so much fun.
The Westminster Dog Show begins with 2,800 dogs at the Piers.
translation.ko: 웨스트민스터 도그 쇼는 2,800여 마리 개들을 데리고 부두에서 시작합니다

translation.en: We start with breed competitions.
Later that night at Madison Square Garden,
the winners of those best of breed competitions will then move on
translation.ko: 견종 대회 우승자들이 그룹 대회로 진출합니다

translation.en: to the groups.
The seven group winners end up in the Best in Show Ring.
translation.ko: 7개 그룹의 우승자들이 쇼 최고상 링에 오르게 되죠

translation.en: The Best in Show winner is then America's dog for the next year.
translation.ko: 쇼 최고상 수상자는 다음 해 미국의 개가 됩니다

translation.en: Let's go.
Oh, here we go.
I'm called the voice of Westminster.
My job is to represent the club.
I take the role very seriously, because I grew up showing dogs
translation.ko: 저는 그 역할을 아주 진지하게 받아들입니다, 왜냐하면 도그 쇼에 나서며 자랐고

translation.en: and I've been part of the sport my entire life.
My parents were breeders. My mother was also a judge,
and I want to represent those people properly.
We're heading to Nasdaq,
and we'll do the closing bell ceremony.
The exhibitors that are already in the city are bringing their dogs,
translation.ko: 이미 뉴욕에 있는 참가자들은 개를 데려오고 있고

translation.en: and they're gonna join us and help promote the sport and promote the show.
translation.ko: 우리에게 합류해서 도그 스포츠와 도그 쇼 홍보를 도울 겁니다

translation.en: -[woman] Hi, are you ready? -I'm ready, let's do it.
[woman] Great.
[woman] One of the best aspects of the show is that it's part of New York.
translation.ko: 쇼의 가장 좋은 점 중 하나는 뉴욕의 일부란 거예요

translation.en: We like that the city joins us in this celebration of dogs,
translation.ko: 개를 위한 이 행사에 뉴욕이 함께하는 게 좋습니다

translation.en: and they have since day one.
[all] Four, three, two, one.
[Alicia] The sport of dogs,
it's something I've done my entire life.
Oh, there it is.
But for me, the history of the show, it's just...
there's nothing like it.
Good boy.
Nice and cool.
-Oh, it feels good, huh, Finny? -Good boy.
Finn, come on, Finn. Come here.
I have the most important job.
Yeah, I know.
[Jamie] It's wine o'clock!
[Alicia] Cheers!
-Cheers. -[Jamie laughs]
I mean, you know, she's a competitor.
She's flashy. She's a big personality.
translation.ko: 얼리샤는 불 같은 데다가 대범한 성격이고

translation.en: You know, you have that kind of dog that goes along with it.
I was born into this breed and brushing, which is...
-it's what you do... -You just brush.
-...It's just what you do. -You're just brushing.
It's relaxing, and it's quiet, and there's the drone of the dryer,
so I put the headphones on, and I watch Netflix.
translation.ko: 그래서 전 헤드폰을 쓰고 그냥 넷플릭스를 보죠

translation.en: Hi, are you saying hi?
Okay, put your head down. Good boy.
This is my first Afghan, and--
translation.ko: 제가 처음 키우는 아프간 하운드예요 - 그런데... - 대박이 터졌지

translation.en: -You hit the jackpot. -Hmm?
-I said you hit the jackpot. [laughs] -I did. Jackpot!
Look, my kids!
-Hey, Finn. -Finny, say, hi, Finn.
Say, hi.
[both] Hi, Finn!
-[boy] Finny. -Hi, Finny. [kisses]
Well, wish Finn good luck.
I can't forget my dress. [laughs]
Betty-Anne is our best in show judge, she's been at Westminster 11 times.
translation.ko: 베티앤은 우리 쇼의 쇼 최고상 심사위원입니다 웨스트민스터에 11번 왔죠

translation.en: We're very proud of the fact that we picked top flight judges,
who are thought of as insightful and fair and experienced.
translation.ko: 통찰력 있고 공정하고 경험 많다고 여겨지는 심사위원이죠

translation.en: When it finally gets to me, the seven best dogs will be in the ring.
translation.ko: 마침내 제 차례가 되면 최고의 개 7마리가 링에 있을 거예요

translation.en: It's my pleasure to find the one I like best.
translation.ko: 가장 마음에 드는 개를 찾는 건 저의 기쁨이죠

translation.en: When we judge dogs, you are bringing your own background to the sport,
translation.ko: 개를 심사할 때는 자신의 배경을 도그 스포츠로 가져옵니다

translation.en: so you can have a slightly different take than somebody else
translation.ko: 그래서 다른 사람들과 조금 의견이 다를 수 있죠

translation.en: and it doesn't mean they're wrong and I'm right.
translation.ko: 남들이 틀렸고 제가 옳다는 건 아닙니다

translation.en: It is very subjective.
We judge on how good a representative of their breed they are.
translation.ko: 우리는 그 견종을 얼마나 잘 나타내느냐를 심사하죠

translation.en: Each breed has a standard
and that standard describes
the perfect dog in that breed.
The length of the head, what the coat should feel like,
translation.ko: 머리의 길이는 어떤지 털은 어떤 느낌이어야 하는지

translation.en: how the dog should move.
When a judge walks into the ring,
they are measuring the dogs they are looking at,
against that ideal standard.
The best one,
you win best of breed.
So once you've done that, then you compete in a group.
There are seven groups,
hound, sporting, herding, non-sporting,
toy, terrier, and working.
The group judge comes in.
What they're trying to assess is which one is closest to perfection
translation.ko: 평가하려는 것은, 어느 개가 이상적인 표준에 따라 가장 완벽에 가깝냐입니다

translation.en: against their ideal standard.
translation.ko: 이상적인 표준에 따라 가장 완벽에 가깝냐입니다

translation.en: So, once they pick that winner in the groups,
translation.ko: 그룹 심사위원이 그룹 우승자를 결정하고 나면

translation.en: the heaviest burden is on the Best in Show judge.
translation.ko: 쇼 최고상 심사위원의 짐이 가장 무겁습니다

translation.en: That judge has to have the kind of experience evaluating
many, many breeds for many, many years.
The devil is in the details.
And then we want a performance,
whoever has got that little extra bit of pizzazz and says, "I'll be the one."
translation.ko: 어느 개든 조금이라도 더 활기차다면 '저 녀석으로 하죠' 그렇게 돼요

translation.en: [man 1] Beautiful dog!
-How about that? [laughs] -[man 2] I'll take the ribbon.
Here's your home. [sighs]
translation.ko: 여기가 네 집이야 "핸들러들은 견종 대회 전 부두에 도착하여"

translation.en: Harrier number six has arrived.
Let's go see the rings.
This is unreal, to actually be here.
translation.ko: 이거... 여기 있는 게 실감이 안 나

translation.en: -[Phyllis] This is-- Wow. -Yeah.
Ring eight.
We worked...
really hard all year,
with the goal of just finally making it here.
translation.ko: 그냥 여기까지 오는 걸 목표로 삼고 말이야

translation.en: We're exhausted right now.
-[Phyllis] Oh, yes. -And she just wants to get in the ring.
-You wanna get in the ring and run around? -She knows she's at a dog show.
translation.ko: - 링에 가서 돌고 싶니? - 도그 쇼에 온 걸 아는 거야

translation.en: Meet the Breeds hearkens all the way back to the purpose of dog shows.
translation.ko: '견종을 만나요'는 도그 쇼의 원래 취지에 집중합니다

translation.en: And that was to have breeders spend the day with each other
and have people who are interested in that particular breed
translation.ko: 특정 견종에 관심 있는 사람들이 도그 쇼에 와서

translation.en: be able to come to the show and talk to those owners and breeders,
who'll be there all day.
I love seeing the joy on people's faces.
translation.ko: 사람들의 기쁜 얼굴을 보는 게 정말 좋아요

translation.en: They're realizing that dogs just fill a hole.
translation.ko: 사람들은 개가 구멍을 메운다는 걸 깨닫죠

translation.en: You know, they really complete people in a unique way.
translation.ko: 개는 정말 사람을 완성시켜요 그 특유의 방식으로요

translation.en: Hey, how are you? Sean McCarthy.
-Good. Nice to meet you, Sean. Mike Gowen. -Nice to see you, too.
I love harriers. Is she competing in the show?
translation.ko: 저는 해리어를 정말 좋아해요 쇼에 출전하나요?

translation.en: -Yes, she is. -Oh, great.
I look forward to seeing you in the group ring.
-[Mike] I hope I get there. Thank you. -[laughs] Okey-doke.
We are at the fifth annual
Westminster Kennel Club Master Agilities Competition.
translation.ko: 웨스트민스터 켄넬 클럽 최고 민첩성 대회입니다

translation.en: It's sort of the Olympics of the sport of dogs.
translation.ko: 도그 스포츠의 올림픽이라고 할 수 있죠

translation.en: [man over PA] Our next dog up is Fame, border collie.
How are you? Good to see you.
-Hello, welcome. -Hello.
Coat check and registration
-is right through there. -Thank you.
First time I ever seen my dog, he was a six-months-old puppy.
translation.ko: 토르를 처음 봤을 때는 6개월 된 강아지였어요

translation.en: And I say, "What a beautiful puppy."
I went to a handler that I used to work for, Esteban Farias,
translation.ko: 제 고용주였던 핸들러 에스테반 파리아스한테 가서

translation.en: and I said, "Look at that dog, he's a beautiful dog."
translation.ko: 말했어요 '저 개 좀 봐요, 정말 예뻐요'

translation.en: But Esteban was supposed to show him,
translation.ko: 그런데 에스테반은 토르를 쇼에 내보내기로 되어 있었고

translation.en: and I start working on the dog, working and working and working.
translation.ko: 저는 토르한테 공들이기 시작했죠 공을 들이고 또 들였어요

translation.en: And Esteban told the owner, "Let Hernan show the dog. The dog loves him."
translation.ko: 그리고 에스테반이 견주에게 말했어요 제가 토르를 쇼에 내보내게 하자고요 토르는 저를 아주 좋아했고 견주는 문제 없다고 했죠

translation.en: And the owner says, "Okay, no problem."
translation.ko: 토르는 저를 아주 좋아했고 견주는 문제 없다고 했죠

translation.en: The way he came to us,
the way we built our relationship, I've been really lucky.
translation.ko: 그렇게 저희 관계를 다졌어요 저는 정말 운이 좋았죠

translation.en: [woman] How is everybody?
Please welcome to the stage, all the way from California,
professional handler and man who knows how to work a terrier's coat,
translation.ko: 프로 핸들러이자 테리어의 털을 제대로 다룰 줄 아는 남자

translation.en: give it up for Bill McFadden!
When you look around the room right now, Bill,
do you smell the winners?
Not so much yet, but I'm sure I'll smell them soon.
[Mike] You know, at a show like this,
I get starstuck,
not only being around some of the handlers that I admire,
translation.ko: 제가 존경하는 핸들러들이 가까이 있을 뿐만 아니라

translation.en: but getting to see some of these dogs up close,
translation.ko: 제가 존경하는 핸들러들이 가까이 있을 뿐만 아니라 그 개들을 가까이에서 본다는 게

translation.en: it's just an incredible experience to be amongst
translation.ko: 그 수준의 하운드와 핸들러들 사이에 있다는 게

translation.en: that level of hound and handler.
You want another Frito?
-Of course. What are you talking about? -Oh, yeah, I know.
Hey, hey.
We're good.
-Okay, put that in there. -Okay.
Carry all those things, put 'em in there.
Here, give me the brush, I'll take it
and put the water bottle in that, next to her.
Let's go.
Here, have a cookie. Here.
There you go, good boy.
[Bartlett] The great show dogs, they have a presence,
the way they stand over themselves or the way that they look at you,
translation.ko: 서 있는 모습이나 사람을 보는 모습이나

translation.en: it commands attention.
It's almost holier than thou.
[Alicia] The Afghan is the king of dogs.
That's how the standard describes them.
When they look at you, they're supposed to look right through you.
translation.ko: 아프간이 여러분을 보면 여러분을 꿰뚫어 볼 거예요

translation.en: They'll be funny one minute and take your breath away the next,
translation.ko: 잠깐 재미있어하고 나면 여러분의 숨을 멎게 하겠죠

translation.en: -with their beauty. -[cheering]
Winning is wonderful.
And to have a dog to win the breed two years in a row, really thrilled.
translation.ko: "견종 대회에서 핀이 우승했다" 제가 기르는 개가 2년 연속 우승하는 건 정말 짜릿하죠

translation.en: -Is Finn happy? -He had fun.
He did. He looked good out there.
I'm overjoyed, I can't even begin to tell you. [laughs]
translation.ko: 너무 기뻐요 너한테 말도 못 할 정도야

translation.en: -It makes it that much sweeter. -And she's my best friend,
translation.ko: 저렇게 말하니 - 더 기분 좋네요 - 그리고 제 절친이니까

translation.en: so it's very exciting, it's more than just a win.
translation.ko: 정말 신나요 이건 그냥 우승이 아니라

translation.en: -It's a win for us. -Yeah.
For all of us, yes.
Happy.
[Mike] All right, let's go, girl.
She's a dog's dog.
This breed is...
everything that you would want in a companion dog.
translation.ko: 반려견에게 바랄 만한 모든 걸 갖추고 있죠

translation.en: She's showing against her sister Stella.
But Emmy, she is the harrier standard.
And that's what this show is all about.
translation.ko: 이 쇼에서 중요한 건 바로 그거고요

translation.en: She's got this expression.
As the judge is walking up, all on her own,
she sees it out of the corner of her eye and does...
that to the judge, consistently.
What she's doing is she's locking eyes with that judge
and going, "Pick me."
It's like, "Look at me."
We're going to the Garden.
We're going to the Garden.
My dog just took Best of Breed and is going to be at Madison Square Garden.
translation.ko: 에미가 막 견종 최고상을 탔고 매디슨 스퀘어 가든으로 갑니다

translation.en: [Mike] Well, that was intense,
even the judge after we won breed
patted me on the shoulder and said, "Just breathe."
translation.ko: 제 어깨를 툭툭 치며 '숨 쉬세요' 했어요

translation.en: A guy like me,
I'm middle aged, out of shape,
don't have tons of money,
but because of her,
because of Emmy,
I walk into the ring on equal footing,
with everybody else in there and...
because of her...
my life has completely changed.
Twenty minutes.
Be back!
[Esteban Farias] My last pug last year,
when I was walking with him,
he suddenly dropped dead.
I mean, I don't--
I have no words for that.
translation.ko: 그 일을 생각하면 뭐라고 할 말이 없네요

translation.en: I mean, Biggie came to our house to fill that hole.
translation.ko: 그 일을 생각하면 뭐라고 할 말이 없네요 "비기 퍼그, 토이 그룹" 비기가 저희 집에 와서 채워줬어요, 그... 구멍을요

translation.en: I should be at dinner with my wife right now,
but I came to support Esteban. [laughs]
Hi, pug.
It's so exciting to see what is gonna happen, you know.
[woman] Oh, my God, there he is!
[man over PA] May we have the Toy Group in the ring, please?
[Gail] This is a wonderful group.
It adds such variety from the Affenpinscher's monkey face,
translation.ko: 토이는 멋진 그룹이에요 정말 다양하죠 아펜핀셔의 원숭이 얼굴부터

translation.en: to the flowing, perfect white coat of the Maltese,
this is such a fun, upbeat little group of companions.
translation.ko: 정말 재미있고 즐거운 작은 친구들의 그룹입니다

translation.en: Esteban Farias is showing Biggie tonight.
translation.ko: 에스테반 파리아스가 오늘 밤 비기를 선보입니다

translation.en: [man] Yeah, this is a heartfelt moment,
when you see Biggie coming out onto the floor.
[man over PA] Puggy confidence with a friendly, sensitive and sincere nature.
translation.ko: 퍼그는 친근하고 세심하며 정직한 성격을 갖고 있습니다

translation.en: This is pug number 15.
[man] David Kirkland will size up the 23 and name the winner of the Toy Group.
translation.ko: 데이비드 커클랜드가 23번을 보고 토이 그룹의 우승자를 발표합니다

translation.en: [Gail] You have Emmitt, the Affenpinscher,
Newton, Brussels Griffon,
Sunito.
Manchester.
Pekingese.
[Gail] Pug, Biggie made it.
[man] One last look, before he makes his selection.
[David] Start with the pug.
[Gail] Here we go.
Looks like Biggie's been pulled out,
of course, a crowd favorite, the pug breed.
2018 Toy Group winner is the pug.
Second, third and fourth.
[Gail] Biggie has won the Toy Group.
[man] The emotional family story continues.
[man 2] Yes, absolutely.
Oh, my God, this is unbelievable.
This is a dream come true.
And I have a little friend who is looking for us, up in the sky,
translation.ko: 그리고... 하늘에서 저희를 지켜볼 작은 친구에게

translation.en: and this is for him.
Absolutely, congratulations again
and get him ready to win tomorrow, Best in Show.
It's a madhouse.
Starting to get hot in here.
There are thousands of people walking by.
We're one day out, and should she win the hound group,
translation.ko: 하루가 남았고 에미가 하운드 그룹에서 우승하면

translation.en: she'll be competing in Best in Show tomorrow night,
translation.ko: 내일 밤 쇼 최고상을 두고 경쟁하게 될 거예요

translation.en: along with representatives from all the other groups.
We will be competing against the best of the best.
translation.ko: 최고 중의 최고와 경쟁하게 될 겁니다

translation.en: But you know something, under the right judge,
Emmy, if she's on,
she has just as much of a chance at winning that group,
as any other dog.
-[man over PA] We have the hound group. -[audience cheering]
[man] Right here we have the first hound.
This is a great example of the Afghan.
You see the prominent hip bones.
That's actually not a skinny dog. That's a trait of the breed.
translation.ko: 도드라진 관골 좀 보세요 깡마른 게 아니라 저 견종의 특징입니다

translation.en: -[Mike] Let's go. -[Gail] She is Mike's very first show dog.
[Mike] All right.
[Gail] Isn't this incredible?
Not everyone has a best of breed winner
-as their first show dog. -[man] That's right.
[Mike] Good girl. Ready?
Emmy.
Right here.
Stand still.
Yes, sir.

-[Gail] These are his selects. -Bloodhound.
-[Gail] He has the basset... -Borzoi.
beagle, bloodhound, borzoi Lucy.
Long.
-[Gail] Long-haired dachshund. -Wire.
And the the wire-haired.

[man] As we said, it's on the day,
and today, the judge chose another dog.
And the winner of the hound group will be the borzoi. Lucy!
[Gail] Lucy does it again.
[man] Lucy, Lucy!
-Congratulations, Valerie. -Thank you.
[Mike] That was amazing.
We didn't place in group, we didn't win the group,
so our road to Westminster ends now.
And our next one starts tomorrow.
We know the borzoi. She's magnificent.
That was not a surprise. That's well-deserved.
That's...
an incredible bitch.
I know that she--
I'm gonna leave with the best dog in this show.
translation.ko: 저는 이 쇼 최고의 개와 함께 떠나겠습니다

translation.en: Period.
You know, it's a dog show.
You win some, you lose some.
translation.ko: 이기고 지기 마련이죠 2년 연속 견종 최고상을 탔어요

translation.en: He won Best of Breed two years in a row, which we're over the moon about.
translation.ko: 이기고 지기 마련이죠 2년 연속 견종 최고상을 탔어요 그건 정말 굉장한 일이죠

translation.en: And my theory is,
there are a lot more judges outside the ring than inside the ring.
translation.ko: 링 안보다 링 바깥에 더 많은 심사위원이 있다

translation.en: [Bartlett] Yes, it's a competition, but in the end,
it's about the friendships. It's about everybody being able to stick together
translation.ko: 중요한 건 교류예요 우리 모두 사랑하는 일을 위해 함께 뭉칠 수 있는 거요

translation.en: for the thing that we all love to do.
translation.ko: 우리 모두 사랑하는 일을 위해 함께 뭉칠 수 있는 거요

translation.en: I mentioned this is what we do for fun, right? [laughs]
-[man] All lovely dogs. -[Gail] You have a ring full
of incredible animals out there,
all wonderful examples of their breed.
translation.ko: 모두 그 견종에서 훌륭한 본보기입니다 "그룹 대회: 논스포팅"

translation.en: This is Flynn, being handled by Bill McFadden.
translation.ko: 이 녀석은 플린입니다 핸들러는 빌 맥패든이고요

translation.en: [woman] The bichon, please.
[Gail] Flynn, the bichon, has won!
-[man] Wow! -[Gail] Non-Sporting Group.
[man] Flynn, rounding out the night,
and in position for tomorrow night's
2018 crowning of Best in Show.
-What is his win record? -His win record,
translation.ko: - 우승 기록이 어떻게 되죠? - 우승 기록요

translation.en: last year, he won 116 group firsts and 41 best in shows.
And...
And, you know, sometimes all they have to do is lift one eyebrow and--
translation.ko: 가끔은 심사위원들이 그냥 한쪽 눈썹만 추켜세우곤...

translation.en: [woman] Biggie! Biggie!
You work all your life
to come to this stage and win something like this,
translation.ko: 이 무대에 와서 이런 상을 받기 위해서요

translation.en: you know, and have the support from each other like this is unbelievable.
translation.ko: 그리고 이렇게 서로에게 도움을 받다니 믿기 어려운 일입니다

translation.en: We are family, and this is so important. This is a big show.
translation.ko: 우리가 가족이란 게 정말 중요하죠 이 쇼는 큰 쇼고요

translation.en: Those are Esteban's kids.
Say to mommy, "We won.
Biggie won."
Yeah, yes.
We should get going, Hernan.
Oh, my God. Oh, my God!
-[woman laughing] -Oh, my God!
[woman] You did it!
Today is Tuesday, it's the final day of the show.
During the day at Piers, we finish Best of Breed.

translation.en: Tonight, the final three groups compete at the Garden
translation.ko: 오늘 밤, 마지막 3개 그룹이 가든에서 경쟁하고

translation.en: and then Best in Show.
When you watch the entrants coming in,
you can look on their faces
and see the hope they have that maybe they're gonna win today.
translation.ko: 오늘 우승할지도 모른다는 희망을 읽을 수 있죠

translation.en: It's exhilarating.
-Mom, Mom, watch your face. -Oh.
translation.ko: 엄마, 얼굴 조심해요 "케리 존스 브리더, 앨리슨의 어머니"

translation.en: -Did you eat? -I got something, yeah.
translation.ko: - 밥 먹었어? - 네, 뭐 좀 먹었어요

translation.en: I'm starving.
[Kerry] When Hernan came to the country,
he came to this country with not even a cellphone.
translation.ko: 에르난이 이 나라에 왔을 땐 휴대전화도 없었어요

translation.en: He's going against handlers
that have been doing this a hell of a lot longer.
He's just a kid that came here with a passion
translation.ko: 에르난은 열정을 품고 이 나라에 온 젊은이였고

translation.en: and a belief in the dog he's showing.
translation.ko: 자기가 선보이는 개에 대한 믿음이 있었어요

translation.en: This would be a dream to come to this country
translation.ko: 이 나라에 와서 견종 최고상을 타는 게

translation.en: and win a breed.
[woman] Can I please have number seven?
Number eight.
Number nine.
Number ten. Number 14.
[Kerry] If you have so much on you--
You have the owner, you have people that are depending on you,
your wife, your dog in itself--
If you get nervous, you could throw the dog off.
translation.ko: 만약 긴장한다면 개를 놓칠 수도 있어요

translation.en: It's like a dance team, you know, if one person's not dancing,
translation.ko: 마치 댄스 팀 같죠 한 명이 춤을 추지 않으면

translation.en: you're probably not winning as a team.
But if you're in sync
and you work together and you move together and everything's right on,
translation.ko: 함께 걷고 함께 움직이고 모든 게 잘 되면

translation.en: the judge is gonna see it.
[Hernan] Always, always.
It's about my dog and me, my connection.
translation.ko: 언제나, 항상 중요한 건 제 개와 접니다 저희의 관계죠

translation.en: It's the first time for me winning a breed.
We work for this, you know,
we work for this.
We come from so far away, dreaming with this.
translation.ko: 저희는 정말 멀리서 왔어요 이 상을 꿈꾸면서요

translation.en: So we go into the group and see what happens, you know.
translation.ko: 이제 그룹 대회로 가서 어떻게 되나 봐야죠

translation.en: I gotta go get my tuxedo now.
[Bill] Last night, my little white fluffball
won the Non-Sporting Group,
and we're waiting to do Best in Show.
So, I've been in the Best in Show ring a few times.
translation.ko: 저는 쇼 최고상 링에 몇 번 올라봤어요

translation.en: I've won once,
so it's kind of like Meryl Streep, gets nominated frequently.
translation.ko: 그러니까 메릴 스트립이 자주 후보가 되는 것과 같죠

translation.en: I've been to the doggy Oscars a few times.
translation.ko: 저는 도그 쇼의 오스카 후보에 몇 번 올라봤어요

translation.en: Tonight, the Best in Show judge, Betty-Anne Stenmark
translation.ko: 오늘 밤의 최고상 심사위원 베티앤 스텐마크는

translation.en: is one of our great ladies in our sport,
translation.ko: 도그 스포츠에서 훌륭한 여성 중 한 명인데요

translation.en: and I just know, whatever she falls in love with tonight
translation.ko: 베티앤이 오늘 밤 사랑에 빠지는 개가

translation.en: is what's gonna go Best in Show.
[Betty-Anne] There's only one Best in Show.
It's the pinnacle of our sport.
And I want to do a good job.
I'm so excited for you, I really am. Oh, I'm so happy for you.
Who would ever have thought?
[Allison] Because my husband forgot his tuxedo.
'Cause I just sprinted to Macy's, asked them,
"Whatever tuxedo you have in this size, just give it to me right now."
translation.ko: '이 치수의 턱시도 있으면 아무거나 당장 주세요'

translation.en: And I grabbed him a specific pink bow tie that he wanted.
translation.ko: 그리고 에르난이 원했던 분홍색 나비넥타이를 매줬어요

translation.en: With this dog especially,
he gets so intense
and I see Thor's personality build up more.
[Hernan] I will only show Thor one more time.

translation.en: This will be last time for him at Westminster,

translation.en: never again.
[man over PA] May we have the Working Group in the ring, please?
[man] 29 entries, boxers have the most working group wins and placements

translation.en: Best in Show 15 times, have come from this group.
[man over PA] The boxer is fearless, highly intelligent and happy.
Originally bred to run down and hold down wild boar and bear,
translation.ko: 원래 멧돼지와 곰을 추적하고 제압하기 위해 개량된 견종입니다

translation.en: he's not a dog for the timid and can be protective when called upon.
translation.ko: 소심하지 않으며 경호견 역할을 할 수 있습니다

translation.en: Extremely intuitive, he is at all times responsive to his owner's moods

translation.en: and is a fine alert companion dog for any family.
This is boxer number ten.

-[man] The boxer-- -[Gail] Here we go.

he's probably wondering where the camera operator is, it's a union shop.

translation.en: [man 2] They got back together right away, that's great.

translation.en: -[Gail] Oh, no. -[man] No, okay.
[man in audience] Come on, judge, don't be shy!
[man 2] Mr. Slay is coming down the line right now.
It's a daunting task with all the different types in here.

translation.en: [Gail] You know, big numbers here in this group.
[man 2] And the giant schnauzer.
[Gail] Ty, the number one dog in the country.
[Gail laughs] Monet!
-And the Siberian Husky. -[Slay] Back 'em right up, please.
[man 2] And we hear the crowd reacting.
Some of them are happy, and some wanted a different dog out there.

translation.en: [man in audience] We still love you, big guy!
The giant schnauzer is number one.
[man] And Ty takes it.
Our sixth group winner, Ty taking the Working Group.
translation.ko: 여섯 번째 그룹의 승자 워킹 그룹의 승자는 타이입니다

translation.en: [Gail laughs] He's very excited.
[man] And tough competition for Ty to survive a pack
-of very, very impressive dogs. -[Gail] Very tough group.
translation.ko: - 다른 후보들이 쟁쟁했어요 - 정말 쉽지 않았죠

translation.en: Very tough group, a lot of top dogs out there.
We said, "The camera!"
And the dog goes like this: truh!
[speaks English] Oh, no!
But it's all right.
We will forgive you this time around.
[Hernan] I wanna start crying, just to think about it.
I will miss showing him.
I will miss just seeing his face,
translation.ko: 토르의 표정을 보는 게 그리울 거예요

translation.en: I will miss...
Thor giving me his heart every time we walk in the ring.
translation.ko: 링을 함께 걸을 때 토르가 제게 마음을 전하는 것도요

translation.en: Thor.
[Betty-Anne] It's electrifying.
translation.ko: 짜릿해요, 가든에 서는 건 언제나 짜릿하죠

translation.en: It always is electrifying in the Garden, but it can be quite daunting.
translation.ko: 짜릿해요, 가든에 서는 건 언제나 짜릿하죠 하지만 꽤 벅차기도 해요

translation.en: Give Biggie a kiss.
Eva.
[man over PA] Introducing the seven group winners competing for Best in Show
translation.ko: 쇼 최고상의 후보인 7개 그룹의 우승자들을 소개합니다

translation.en: at the 142nd Westminster Dog Show.
The winner of the Herding Group,
border collie.
The winner of the Hound Group, borzoi.
The winner of the Working Group, giant schnauzer.
The winner of the Non-Sporting Group, bichon frise.
The winner of the Toy Group, pug.
[man] Betty-Anne Stenmark sizing them up. The borzoi has never won Best in Show.
translation.ko: 베티앤 스텐마크가 심사합니다 보르조이는 최고상을 받은 적 없죠

translation.en: Same for giant schnauzer and for Norfolk terrier.
Could one of them break through?
[Betty-Anne] Love the borzoi bitch, she's beautiful.
Giant schnauzer is a magnificent dog.
He has a really good hard coat on him and beautifully presented.
translation.ko: 아주 좋은 털을 가지고 있고 이를 아름답게 표현했어요

translation.en: The Sussex, a wonderful little dog.
That bichon has that little extra something and went,
"Oh, lady, I'm really doing it for you tonight."
translation.ko: 마치 '자, 숙녀분' '당신을 위해 하는 겁니다' 그러는 것 같죠

translation.en: The pug's a very seasoned little exhibitor out there.
He will have a lovely future.
It's not a difficult job, because at that point, they are really good dogs.
translation.ko: 어려운 일이 아니에요 정말 좋은 개들이니까요

translation.en: And it becomes show time,
translation.ko: 그리고 때가 되면 수많은 관중과 수많은 소음 속에서

translation.en: and all those people and all those noises,
there will be a dog who is demanding to be looked at,
translation.ko: 바라볼 수밖에 없는 한 마리의 개가 있어요

translation.en: who can look down its nose at you and say, "You will be putting me up,
translation.ko: 저를 깔보며 말하죠 '당신은 나를 뽑을 거예요'

translation.en: because I am the king or the queen today."
[Gail] She's made her decision.
[man] The tension.
Best in Show will be the bichon frise. Flynn!
[Gail] Flynn wins Best in Show.
[man] Upsetting the number one rated dog coming in
translation.ko: 1위일 거라 평가받았던 다른 유명한 개들은 속상하겠군요

translation.en: and a couple of other popular dogs, like Biggie.
translation.ko: 1위일 거라 평가받았던 다른 유명한 개들은 속상하겠군요 비기처럼요

translation.en: [man 2] It just shows, you never know who's gonna win at Westminster.
translation.ko: 웨스트민스터에선 누가 우승할지 모른다는 걸 보여줍니다

translation.en: [woman] Bill, congratulations.
It is obviously every handler's dream to win at Westminster.
translation.ko: 빌, 축하합니다 웨스트민스터에서 우승하는 건 모든 핸들러의 꿈이죠 기분이 어떠신가요?

translation.en: What does it feel like?
translation.ko: 모든 핸들러의 꿈이죠 기분이 어떠신가요? "최고상 자리"

translation.en: Well, it feels a little unreal
and...
it's just magical, you know.
[Esteban] This is what we do for a living,
but I think the dogs are more important than money,
translation.ko: 제가 생각하기에... 개는 돈보다 더 중요합니다

translation.en: They're animals, you know.
They are dogs that we take care and they take care of us.
translation.ko: 동물이지만, 그러니까 우리는 개를 돌봐주고 개는 우리를 돌봐줘요

translation.en: The dogs take care as our family.
The common thread is that it's about community.
translation.ko: 공통된 의견은 중요한 건 공동체란 겁니다

translation.en: It is a good feeling to know that other dog people are there to help.
translation.ko: 서로 도울 이들이 있음을 아는 건 기분 좋은 일이죠

translation.en: That's something our sport can be very proud of,
translation.ko: 도그 스포츠가 아주 자랑스러워할 만한 건

translation.en: is that we do help each other.
We're a family, definitely.
Might be a little quirky, we're a quirky family.
translation.ko: 조금 별날지도 몰라요 우리는 별난 가족이에요

translation.en: I think anybody that's out there, you should go home,
translation.ko: 쇼 바깥에 있는 누구든 집에 가서

translation.en: give your dog a hug, because dogs are amazing, they make your life better.
translation.ko: 여러분의 개를 안아주세요 여러분의 삶을 더 좋게 해주니까요

translation.en: Just spend a minute, look in their eyes
translation.ko: 잠시만 시간을 들여서 두 눈을 바라보세요

translation.en: and if that isn't a connection, I don't know what is.
You ready? ¡Vamos!
